pt.ist.fenixframework.util

Class JsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ist.fenixframework.util.JsonConverter

  • public final class JsonConverter
extends Object
    Utility class containing methods to convert the Framework's builtin ValueTypes to and from Json. The methods of this class are Code Generator friendly, so they can be used to convert any slot to a JsonElement
    Author:
    Jo√£o Carvalho (joao.pedro.carvalho@ist.utl.pt)
